reviewText: If your child or grandchild loves Bob the Builder and his team, you might enjoy listening in to Lofty's adventures.  Lofty has some fears and insecurities like most children do and watching how Bob & the gang interact with Lofty can provide reassurance to children.  My grandson loves this and watches it frequently.
This is great for my bob the builder fan of a little boy! The movie came in a timely manner and he loves it no scratches or anything.
I love it because it makes my grandson very happy. He could watch this movie over and over. It is a typical Bob the Builder movie.
